Thanks for downloading this app, I hope you've enjoyed it!

 All images used here were taken from the OpenClipart.org website, and they are all free to use. That means you can use your comics in anyway you want it, without worrying about copyright.

If you have ANY suggestion for this app, please email me at vdsantiago1@gmail.com. I'll reply as soon as possible, and see what I can do about it. 

One last thing, if you really liked it, consider rating this app on Google Play. (There should be a button that will take you there on the side menu)

You can buy more images to use on your comics for only 99 cents. 

Plus, we'll remove the ads if you do, and you'll help support this app. 

Just go to the side menu on the left, and click on "Buy extras".
Does anybody have a question on how to create a comic?
How do we select another character?
Just tap on it, and you\'ll be able to select from hundreds of others.
You can also tap on the text to change it.
Yes, there should be a + and - sign on the top right corner to add and remove panels.
There are also buttons there to save and share your image.
Tap on the text to change it, or on the character to choose another one.
